price: 92. Tačiau nepritinka Maloningiausiojo (Allaho) (Didenybei) gimdyti sūnų (arba palikuonių arba vaikų).
arabic: وَمَا يَنۢبَغِي لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā yanbaghī lilrraḥmāni an yattakhidha waladan
